pullRequest.title: rename new orchestration module.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #3185.
Changes proposed in this pull request:

nodes.bodyText: As for ConfigCenter, shall these four TestRegistryCenters be renamed as TestConfigCenter?
Shall these three TestRegistryCenter be renamed as TestDistributedLockManagement?
Shall these three TestRegistryCenter be renamed as TestDistributedLockManagement?

nodes.bodyText:

name unification with RegistryCenter and DistributeLockManagement test class.
